lucid dreaming.ability: Grants LUCID_DREAM, a CARD that allows you to duplicate a mental construct.
lucid dreaming.description: Control your dreams, lest they control you.
lucid dreaming.lore_1: Lucid dreaming is when you become aware and can control your dreams.
lucid dreaming.lore_2: Some believe it's a portal to other dimensions or a method used by ancient mystics.
lucid dreaming.lore_3: There's debate on whether lucid dreaming can be learned or if it naturally occurs.

flourid effect.description: Is there more to water fluoridation than meets the eye?
flourid effect.lore_1: Fluoride is allegedly added to water to prevent tooth decay, but some believe it has other effects.
flourid effect.lore_2: Fluoride is a known neurotoxin and has been linked to a range of health problems, including reduced IQ, cancer, and reproductive issues.
flourid effect.lore_3: It's suggested that it might be used to control population or suppress pineal gland function, preventing psychic mass awakening.

mk ultra.ability: Can re-roll rarity of Conspiracies during GNOSIS, +%s times.
mk ultra.lore_1: MK Ultra was a CIA program that experimented on unwitting subjects to develop mind control techniques.
mk ultra.lore_2: The program used drugs, hypnosis, and other methods to manipulate subjects' minds, causing severe psychological trauma.
mk ultra.lore_3: Some suggest that the techniques used in MK Ultra are still being used today, possibly on unsuspecting citizens.

pineal gland.description: The third eye of the mind.
pineal gland.lore_1: The pineal gland is a small, pea-sized gland located in the brain.
pineal gland.lore_2: It's often associated with psychic abilities and spiritual experiences.
pineal gland.lore_3: Some believe it's a key to unlocking higher consciousness or even immortality.

agartha.description: A hidden world beneath the Earth's surface.
agartha.lore_1: Agartha is a mythical kingdom said to exist inside the Earth.
agartha.lore_2: It's described as an advanced civilization with technology and wisdom beyond our own.
agartha.lore_3: Some explorers claim to have found entrances, though these are often shrouded in mystery.

astral projection.ability: Doubles the range of a MENTAL_CONSTRUCT
astral projection.lore_1: Astral projection is the act of projecting one's astral body into the astral plane.
astral projection.lore_2: The CIA has been experimenting with astral projection for decades via the MK Ultra program.
astral projection.lore_3: CIA agents have reported hostile entities when astrally projecting.

nephilim.ability: Grants all ANNUNAKI_SUNDIAL constructs +%s psychic damage
nephilim.description: Giants from the past or myth?
nephilim.lore_1: The Nephilim are described in ancient texts as the forbidden offspring of angels and humans.
nephilim.lore_2: They are linked to legends of giants, advanced knowledge, and global catastrophes.
nephilim.lore_3: Rumors persist that some are still alive even today, and that their existence is being suppressed by the government.

tulpas.lore_1: Tulpas are thoughtforms or beings created through intense mental concentration and belief.
tulpas.lore_2: This concept straddles the line between spiritual practice and psychological phenomenon.
tulpas.lore_3: Some believe they can become autonomous, influencing reality or appearing to others.

operation blue beam.ability: Increase the Psychic Damage, of all UFO themed MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs by +%s
operation blue beam.description: A staged alien invasion to control humanity?
operation blue beam.lore_1: Operation Blue Beam is a conspiracy theory suggesting a fake alien invasion to unite world governments.
operation blue beam.lore_2: It allegedly involves holographic technology, psychological warfare, and manipulation of religious beliefs.
operation blue beam.lore_3: Proponents see current global events as signs of this plan being set into motion.

occult knowledge.description: Hidden wisdom or just ancient superstition?
occult knowledge.lore_1: Occult knowledge refers to secret or esoteric traditions that claim to understand the universe's mysteries.
occult knowledge.lore_2: The traditions of ancient civilizations often include knowledge of the universe's origins and the nature of reality.
occult knowledge.lore_3: The symbols and rituals associated with the occult are often hidden inplain sight, for those with eyes to see.

space is fake.ability: Increase the speed, of all UFO themed MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs by +%s
space is fake.description: Is outer space just a giant hoax?
space is fake.lore_1: Space is often portrayed as a vast, mysterious realm filled with celestial bodies and unknown phenomena.
space is fake.lore_2: There are those who argue all images and evidence of space are manipulated or created in studios.
space is fake.lore_3: The moon landing is often cited as a prime example of this, with many believing it was staged.

divination.description: Seeing the future or just illusion?
divination.lore_1: Divination is the practice of seeking knowledge of the future or unknown through supernatural means.
divination.lore_2: The ancient romans used augury to predict the future, and the bible mentions the use of the Urim and Thummim to see the future.
divination.lore_3: The entrails of animals and the movement of birds could indicate portents of the future.

pantheism.description: Is everything divine or is it just nature?
pantheism.lore_1: Pantheism is the belief that the universe itself is divine, not separate from God or gods.
pantheism.lore_2: This philosophy can lead to views where everything is interconnected or part of a single consciousness.
pantheism.lore_3: This relates to the idea of the ONE or the ALL, being that which created everything in its mind.

philosopher's stone.description: Eternal life or just alchemy's greatest myth?
philosopher's stone.lore_1: The Philosopher's Stone is legendary in alchemy for its supposed ability to turn base metals into gold.
philosopher's stone.lore_2: The alchemist's hid their knowledge using symbols and metaphors, deciphering them grants eternal life.
philosopher's stone.lore_3: Via the sublimation of fire, the alchemist can turn base metals into gold, and the gold into the Philosopher's Stone.

vampires.ability: Grants a MENTAL_CONSTRUCT VAMPIRISM, granting that construct +%s exp on hit.
vampires.lore_1: Vampires, creatures that feed on blood or life force, are central to many cultural myths.
vampires.lore_2: Some conspiracy theories suggest real vampires exist, hidden in society or as part of secret bloodlines.
vampires.lore_3: Whether seen as metaphor for social parasites or literal beings, the vampire myth endures.

aura.ability: Grants a MENTAL_CONSTRUCT AURA, granting that construct +%s psychic damage.
aura.description: Can you see the energy around us?
aura.lore_1: An aura is believed to be an energy field surrounding living beings, visible to some.
aura.lore_2: Theories suggest that the color, size, and shape of an aura reflect one's health, mood, or spirit.
aura.lore_3: Some theoriest argue that dna is an antenna designed to receive and transmit such energies, from where it is stored in the pineal gland.

bohemian grove.ability: SACRIFICE %s cards to from your hand and for each card sacrificed givens +%s extra damage to next MENTAL_CONSTRUCT
bohemian grove.lore_1: Bohemian Grove is a secluded campground where the rich and powerful allegedly hold secretive meetings.
bohemian grove.lore_2: The statue of moloch is said to be a symbol of the grove, and the elite are said to worship it.
bohemian grove.lore_3: The ultimate goal of the elite is to control the people in power through rituals and blackmail. Those who are not in the group shall have a hard time finding success in politics.

gangstalking.ability: Increases debuff speed of ALL_SEEING_EYE by +%s
gangstalking.lore_1: Gangstalking is the practice of following someone, often with malicious intent, to cause psychological distress.
gangstalking.lore_2: The targets are often chosen based on their perceived weaknesses or vulnerabilities.
gangstalking.lore_3: The goal is to wear them down through constant surveillance and psychological manipulation.

experiments on humans.lore_1: Conspiracy theories often allege that governments or corporations conduct illegal experiments on humans.
experiments on humans.lore_2: Various governemnts have addmitted to such experiments, and the CIA has been known to fund such projects.
experiments on humans.lore_3: Human cloning, mind control, biological warfare, for those with no morals and no conscience there are many exciting fields of study.

pseudosciences.ability: Draw %s random MENTAL_CONSTRUCT, from the deck, into your hand.
pseudosciences.lore_1: Pseudoscience covers claims presented as scientific but lacking in credible evidence or methodology.
pseudosciences.lore_2: Examples range from astrology to alternative medicine, often appealing due to their simplicity or promises.
pseudosciences.lore_3: Scientific consensus often is beholden to those funding it, that which offers no profit is liekly to be dismissed or supressed.

saturn's rings.lore_1: Some fringe theories suggest Saturn's rings are not natural but artificially created or enhanced.
saturn's rings.lore_2: Speculations range from ancient alien technology to modern human intervention for unknown purposes.
saturn's rings.lore_3: Saturn as a mythological figure is a symbol of the destruction of the old world, and the birth of the new.

polar shift.description: Could Earth's poles flip in our lifetime?
polar shift.lore_1: A polar shift refers to the Earth's magnetic poles potentially reversing or moving significantly.
polar shift.lore_2: The polar shift is said to be a sign of the end times, and the beginning of a new age.
polar shift.lore_3: The elite are said to be preparing for this event, and the new world order will be built on the ashes of the old.

oumuamua.ability: Increases the range of all UFO themed MENTAL_CONSTRUCTs by +%s
oumuamua.description: Alien probe or just a strange rock?
oumuamua.lore_1: Oumuamua is a mysterious object that passed through our solar system in 2017.
oumuamua.lore_2: It's flat shape and lack of a tail suggest it's not a comet or asteroid.
oumuamua.lore_3: It could be a probe, the remnant of one, what mysteries it holds is yet to be seen.

fish rain.description: A natural phenomenon or something more?
fish rain.lore_1: Fish rain involves fish falling from the sky, often explained by waterspouts or tornadoes.
fish rain.lore_2: However certain instances have been reported far inland, and the fish are not native to the area.
fish rain.lore_3: Some believe this is a sign of the end times, and the fish are the souls of the fallen.

elite politician body doubles.description: Are our leaders who we think they are?
elite politician body doubles.lore_1: Theories suggest that elite politicians use body doubles for security, health, or to be in multiple places.
elite politician body doubles.lore_2: Current disguise technology is advanced enough that any person can be made to look like another, without anyone noticing.
elite politician body doubles.lore_3: However the theory takes a sinister turn when it is suggested that celebrities and politicians can be replaced should the original fail to obey the elite.

butterfly effect.lore_1: The Butterfly Effect in chaos theory suggests small actions can lead to significant, unpredictable outcomes.
butterfly effect.lore_2: Similar to the three body problem, the butterfly effect informs us that small, seemingly inconsequencal actions can be wide ranging effects on other outcomes.
butterfly effect.lore_3: The butterfly effect is a reminder that the future is not set in stone, and that our actions can shape the world in ways we may not have imagined.

lemuria and mount shasta.description: A lost continent beneath a sacred mountain?
lemuria and mount shasta.lore_1: Lemuria is a mythical continent said to have sunk beneath the Pacific Ocean.
lemuria and mount shasta.lore_2: Legends describe a hidden city, Telos, with advanced Lemurians living in tunnels under the mountain.
lemuria and mount shasta.lore_3: Those who seek the ascended masters will find them upon reaching the peak of mount shasta.

crystal skulls.lore_1: Crystal skulls are often linked to ancient civilizations, believed to hold mystical powers or knowledge.
crystal skulls.lore_2: The skulls are too precise to have been carved by hand, and the crystal is too pure to have been formed naturally.
crystal skulls.lore_3: Legends claim there are 13 such skulls, which when united, could reveal great secrets or powers.
